entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers early this morning. 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 8. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 7 April 2023
